column1: full and wide outside off, and swinging just a bit away. Left alone by Dhawan
another one hovering outside the stumps, and cut square past point to deep point. Two men from inside the circle give it a chase

big appeal but the umpire is disinterested. Full, on off, and Dhawan had prodded forward to defend, but the ball hit his pads. Conference between the WI players and Holder goes for a review! Definitely looked like an inside edge on first glance, but what do the replays show? Oooooh, it looks like front pad-back pad, and no bat involved. Impact in front of off stump, and that is smashing into middle stump. Epic review - Dhawan goes!
full toss, on middle, and clattered to mid-off
overpitched just outside off, with Cottrell searching for the ball swinging in. Mistimes to cover
length, on off, and tapped to mid-off. Dangerous single, but they scamper across
hold that pose! Full, just outside off, and just a small step forward before Kohli plays an elegant cover drive. Nobody bothered moving
length ball, just outside off, but too close to Kohli's body for the cut. Ball goes between bat and body to the keeper

another length ball on off that angles into his body. Kohli tries to defend off the back foot, but the ball takes the inside-edge and rolls away to the fine-leg boundary. Not the most good-looking shot that the India captain has played in his career
back of a length, way outside off, and left alone by Kohli.
full, on off, and Kohli tries to defend off the front foot. Bat's face, howeve, has turned too soon... and the ball is spliced to mid-on
back of a length, outside off, and left alone by Rohit. That's his first ball
another length ball, angling into Rohit, and he rocks back to block with soft hands

overpitched, wide outside off, and he mistimes a wedged shot to point. Kohli scampers across for a single, but Rohit would've been out had Pooran got the direct hit. Risky cricket! Rohit was nowhere near the crease when the ball passed the stumps
length ball, on middle, and swinging into his pads. Guided off his pads to the leg side
length ball on middle, and swerving into his pads again. Defended, with the full face of the bat
full and wide outside off, and he reaches forward to drive. Played away from his body to cover
length ball outside off, angling slightly away and Rohit sticks his bat out. Ball whizzes past his outside edge
length ball, on leg stump, and clipped to short fine leg. Rohit wants the single, Kohli doesn't. Eventually they don't
fullish, wide outside off, and Kohli taps it away to cover with soft hands
full-ish, just outside off, and angling into off stump. He prods forward to defend
full just outside off, and he launches forward to drive. But mistimed, and the ball rolls to mid-off
full, on off and angling into his pads. Kohli whips it off his toes, and generates the power from the bottom hand. No chance for the fielder at deep midwicket
back of a length, wide outside off, but inside the tram-lines. Left alone by Kohli too, but the umpire calls it a wide

full, just outside off, and driven straight. Can't beat Lewis at mid-off, though. One reason why Kohli could not generate the pace he wanted off the bat was because his front-foot was still in the air
length ball, just outside off, but angling in. He guides it down to short third man for a single
full, on leg stump, and Kohli tries to flick this through square leg. Ball hits his pads, and falls just short of the keeper
full, just outside off, and he presses forward to drive. Mistimed to cover this time
back of a length, on middle, and gently flicked off his waist to fine leg. Roach, at deep backward square, runs across to intercept
full, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to run it to third man. Fielder at backward point - Hetmyer - dives over the ball, but there was protection in the form of deep point
overpitched, searching for the yorker. Lands just outside off, and Rohit toe-ends it to the off side
full, straight, on middle, and carefully fended off the front foot with the bat's full face
length ball, just outside off, and he tries to punch off the back foot. Inside-edged onto his pads this time
back of a length, outside off stump, and fended with the bat's open face to point
extra bounce, back of a length outside off, and he tries to flay this over third man. Misses it altogether. Rohit yet to get off the mark
full, just outside off, and driven through the covers. Not timed exquisitely, but enough to get off the mark
appeal for lbw but not given! Hits the deck, on a length just outside off, and sears inwards. Cuts Rohit in half, but while the ball did hit his pad, it was always going to miss the stumps
full, and pays the price for it. The bowler's natural angle into the batsman allows Rohit to put his front foot across the stumps and flick through midwicket
full toss first up from Oshane, nearly chest high. Kohli keeps his eyes on the ball, and bunts it back to the bowler

what a comeback ball! Soft appeal from Oshane for caught-behind too, but not given. Full, fast, lands outside off, and Kohli prods forward to defend. The ball whizzes past his outside edge, straightening after hitting the deck. Kohli had no clue!
full, on leg stump, and tries to whip it behind square. Goes past his pads, and wide given

full, on middle, and clipped with the bat's closed face to deep midwicket. Chase gives the ball a mighty chase and manages to parry the ball back! Excellent effort from the fielder, maybe the overnight rain has made the outfield slow
back of a length, just outside off, and left alone by Rohit. Proper shouldering of arms this time
full, on middle. Defended with the bat's closed face to mid-on. Plays it with the delivery's natural angle
back of a length, on off, forcing him to move backwards. Nudged off his waist to the leg side
full, on off, and flicked off his toes to midwicket. Finds the fielder though
full, on middle, and Kohli hammers this through the leg side! Ambles his feet across the stumps and then smacks it to the boundary
length ball, on middle, and fended off the back foot to mid-on
length ball, wide outside off, and left alone by Kohli. Inside the wide-line though
full, just outside off, and he places his front foot outside off stump before driving past the non-striker. Stopped by mid-on, diving to his left
back of a length, outside off, and now left alone once again
full, just outside off, and nudged to mid-on off the front foot
length ball, on middle, and angling down the leg side
chest-high full toss, on middle, ball slipped from his hands, but managed to flick it to deep backward square leg. This time, given a no ball. Oshane asks Kohli if he's okay, good sportsmanship
sliced and taken by Hope... but it's a free hit! Aye, caramba. Back of a length, outside off, and he tries to pull but it wasn't the right ball for that shot
full, on middle, and angling in. Flicked to midwicket for a quick single
length ball, just outside off, and defended with the bat's closed face to square leg. They scamper across for a single
full, on middle and angling into his pads. Flicked off his toes to fine leg for a couple more
overpitched, just outside off, and he wedges a mistimed drive to cover. Well stopped by the infielder, diving to his right
full, wide outside off, and he throws his bat at this, squeezing a shot square through deep point. Another chase for Roston
back of a length, wide outside off, and swinging further away. The TV commentators reckon it's a wide, but not given. Fair call, one would think
length ball, just outside off, and Kohli presses forward to tap with the bat's open face to point
full and wide outside off, and he taps with soft hands to point. No chance of a single on this occasion
full, outside off stump forcing Kohli to reach at it. Kohli drives away from his body, but can't find that perfect connection. Ball dribbles away to mid-off
full, on middle, and he simply gets on top of the ball, and flicks this from under his eyes. Finds the gap between mid-on and midwicket
take my money! Full, on off, and Rohit uses his bottom hand to play an exquisite checked straight-drive past the bowler's ankles. My oh my
full, on leg stump. Flicked to deep backward square leg
full, just outside off, and tapped away to point
short, on off, and Kohli ducks under this. Nice carry through to Hope on this occasion
full, on leg stump. Drifting past his pads, but Kohli manages to nudge it behind square. Protection there though
full outside off, but the ball stays low! He goes for a mighty heave - given the width offered - but the ball goes under the bat
full, on off, and turning inwards. Tapped to the leg side to square leg, where Cottrell dives to stop the ball. Parries it away slightly, but recovers to stop the extra run
full, on off, and defended back to the bowler
full, on off and turning inwards. Defended to mid-on
length ball, on off and turning inwards. Guided off his waist to square leg for a walking single
full, well flighted. Played with the bat's closed face to midwicket
full, just outside off, and Kohli takes a giant stride to meet the ball. Whips it away to deep midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and flicked to midwicket from outside the stumps
fuller, just outside off, and tapped back to the bowler
length ball, outside off, and he bends his knees to cut square, but the ball stays low, and the delivery gets under-edged
length ball, on middle, and tapped off the back foot to mid-on
short of length, outside off. Stays on the back foot, and punches to long on
length ball, wide outside off but angling in. Rohit opens the bat's face and guides it behind square to deep point
full, on off, and turning into his pads. Clipped behind square to Mr 300 at short fine leg
length ball outside off, but skidding through. Kohli was back-foot trying to fend the offbreak, but the ball held it's line and very nearly took the outside edge
full, just outside off, and turning in. Kohli stretches forward to defend
length ball, on middle, and he goes deep inside his crease before whipping a shot past square leg and wide of the sweeper-fielder on the leg side. Easy peasy
well stopped! That had four written all over it too, but Chase's dive to his right stops the boundary. Overpitched on off, and hammered straight back
full, on middle. Flicked to the leg side off the front foot
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot
length ball, outside off stump, and mistimes a cut to point
length ball, outside off, and punched past the ambling Gayle to deep extra cover
back of a length, on middle. Clipped to midwicket while tiptoeing
back of a length, outside off, but angling inwards. Tiptoes and punches, but mistimes it to mid-on
edged past the keeper! And that's Kohli's fifty. His 55th in ODIs. Another length ball angling in, and he opened the bat's face to place this perfectly past the third-man fielder riding the boundary
length, tossed up at off stump. Blocked down the pitch
tossed up outside off, gets forward and turns it into the leg side

taken at point! A misguided hoick from Rohit. Another tossed up ball, nice and slow outside off. Not much drift or revs on it, just a proper lack of pace. Dips on him as he steps out and then grips in the pitch. Gets some extra bounce as a result and Rohit's attempted slog into the leg side ends up in a one-handed losing of shape. Leading edge and Pooran runs back to hold on smartly
floated full outside off, leans in and drives firmly back to the bowler
full outside off, driven to long-off
length on middle stump, looks to flick to long-on, bowler gets across to stop to his right
length at middle stump, defended hurriedly into the off side
that's graceful. Full on middle stump, half a stride down to meet it and gets a lovely little whip at this to get it through midwicket
leading edge as he closes the face on a short ball. That kicked up from a length and he wanted to turn it square. Ends up at point
raps the glove this time! Follows it up with a stare. Short of a length and getting steep again, up at his grille. Looks to defend and it late on it
short of a length on off stump, defended down the pitch
runs off the face of the bat as he tries to leave this ball. Bat hanging. Length ball outside off and it ends up a single at third man
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
short outside off, waits on it and chops it to sweeper's right
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
full on off stump, leans in and drives to long-off
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
behind square with the cut this time and no stopping that. Looks like an arm ball, skidding on with the arm, but he chops late to backward point's right
slapped out to sweeper cover. Slower ball at a length with a lot of width. Waits on it and gives it a nice smack
short of a length on off stump, leans in and dabs it into the midwicket region
overpitched on leg stump, shuffles and flicks to fine leg
length outside off, punched on the rise to extra cover
length outside off, steered to point on the front foot
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg's right
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off, looks to drop into the off side and steal a single. Sent back
full outside off, driven to extra cover
length on off stump, coming in at the body. Blocked
length, pushed through flat at off stump. Defended on the back foot
tossed up at middle stump, watchfully defended into the leg side
length on off stump, leans in and flicks to long-on
length outside off, tapped on the rise to extra cover
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine
short at middle stump, pulled off the front foot to deep square
length on off, leans in and flicks to long-on
short at leg stump, pulled down to fine leg
length at off stump, defended into the covers
full on off stump, driven on the front foot, back to the bowler
length at off stump, forces him to poke into the off side
length and in at leg stump. Looks to flick, cops it on the pad
short and just outside off, cuts firmly to point and a misfield there gives him two
short outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short of a length at off stump, opens the face and runs it to point off the back foot

hits the top of off! Something like 12 dot balls for Pant in his last 14 balls, and it has elicited a dismal whip across the line. Superbly engineered by West Indies. Kept bowling at his body, forcing him to push around, and when the runs dried up, they played on his inexperience - a slower ball from Brathwaite. Cutting away from middle. He wants to scoop towards fine leg but it is the wrong option. Yet another soft end to a Pant innings
length outside off, allows it to come on and runs it to third man
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
bouncer dug in too short. Ducks under it
short of a length on off stump, drops it pitch side on the off side
short of a length at off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
length on middle stump, flicked to square leg
tossed up at middle stump, driven back down the pitch
short of a length on leg stump, glanced to short fine

mix-up! But all safe in the end. Full ball on off, flicks towards log-on. Evin Lewis sprints to his left from midwicket and sticks a boot out to stop it. Iyer turns around to run back from halfway down the pitch
length on off stump, punched to extra cover's right
length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
length outside off, punched on the rise to point
length outside off, walks across and flicks to midwicket
slower ball at a length outside off, dabbed to point's left off the back foot
nicely placed between backward point and gully. Short of a length, allows it to come on and chops from inside the line to bisect them
top edge as he snatches at this short ball. Can't get over it and it lobs harmlessly into the square leg area
length at middle stump, hard-handed push into the leg side
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
short and wide outside off, cuts to backward point
tossed up at off stump, gets to the pitch and drives to long-on
full on leg stump, flicked but square leg dives to the left and stops that
short of a length on middle stump, flicked to square leg's left

Kohli scrambling back and diving at the striker's end! He would have been out if midwicket got a direct hit. Kohli taps to midwicket's right and takes off for a run and is sent back halfway. Iyernot interested in that run. He would have been running to the danger end
short of a length on middle, whipped to deep square
length at middle, poked down to long-on
slower short ball at a length outside off. Punched to long-on off the back foot
short of a length in the corridor, dabbed into the gully region
short at leg stump, shuffles and awkwardly bunts it to fine leg's left. Oshane there and you can hear the early call for what is a comfortable two in the end
length at middle stump, steps out and flicks to midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
length at off stump, leans in and whips to midwicket
short and just outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length outside off, driven on the rise to extra cover
length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man

lifts it over the keeper! Neatly done. Short ball in the corridor, gets down expecting that to rise but that might have been a slower ball. It's waist height, but he's kept his eyes on the ball and that allows him to adjust and just ramp this
length in the corridor, defended towards point
length at off stump, pushed to point from the crease
outside edge floats past the keeper's dive to the right! This jumps up from a length as he gets behind to defend in the corridor. Thick edge, too far for keeper
drilled! Wow. Tossed up outside off, behind the line quickly and pummels this with brute wrists. Past Iyer and even long-on's big slide to the left gives him no chance
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length outside off, defended to point off the front foot
past the outside edge. Drives from inside the line, off the back foot. That's not turned and it slides past the bat
length at middle, tries to force it into the leg side. Leading edge to point
length outside off, leans in and drives to long-off's left
length outside off, punched on the rise to sweeper's right
length outside off, sliced on the up to sweeper cover
length outside off, drives on the front foot, back to the bowler
length at off stump, shuffles across and clips to long-on
length outside off, punched on the rise to sweeper cover
length outside off, looks to drive on the rise, thick outside edge down to third man
length outside off, steps out and tries to run it down. Point swoops down on it
length outside off, leans in and punches back to the bowler
dabs it to the third man boundary. Short and wide outside off, opens the face and beats third man to the left
short of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on
oh, deftly done. Short of a length outside off, allows it on, runs it fine just like Kohli had earlier
down the track and drives it on the up through covers but there is a man in the deep who keeps it to one
drifts on the pads and flicked away by Iyer towards deep square leg, a very casual Chase goes down with one hand and stops the boundary
short of length outside off and cut away, deep point in place though
length ball on middle and leg, turned away towards short fine leg
fuller outside off, Kohli comes forward and works it towards wide long-on
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards deep midwicket for one
length ball just outside off, and guided to third man for a single. A gentle dab
punched, to Holder, who sticks his hand out to stop
length ball, just outside off, and he mistimes a cut to point. Kohli wants the single, and they scamper across
up and over! And that is glorious. Full, in the slot just outside off, and that's been struck over the bowler's head. Terrific
full, on his toes, and tapped to midwicket for a quick single
steep deviation inwards and a soft appeal for lbw, but not given. Length ball angling into his pads, and it looks like Kohli Iyer inside-edged a whipped shot right into his pads
back of a length, on off, and he tries to pull, but splices the shot to midwicket
length ball, angling in, and he opens the bat's face to run it down to short third man
length ball, on off, and angling in. Kohli tries to drive straight but it flies off the bat's top-half. Ball dribbles down to long on
length ball, outside off, and he runs this down to short third man once again

in the air, and it falls just over mid off! This was a short ball on off and he tried to pull, but the shot was spliced. But Iyer was never going to be out, because there was one fielder less inside the circle. Oh dear, amateur error. Free hit
attempted yorker, and shoveled straight to long off. Hit so hard that even a single was difficult
placed! Length ball, angling into his pads, and flicked past short fine leg for four! Just five away from his hunder
play-and-a-miss. Length ball outside off, and tries to punch uppishly, but through to the keeper
ramped! Back of a length, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to play this over the keeper. Terrific effort from short third man
runs this down to short third man on this occasion
full, on off, and driven to wide long on for a single
fullish, just outside off, and tapped with soft hands, back to the bowler
slower ball, rolls his fingers over the delivery. Lands on off, at a length, and flicked to deep midwicket
full, on middle, and defended to cover
length ball, on off, and punched to cover
length ball, on leg stump, but angling further down. Wide called
full outside off, and he prods forward to drive. Finds the fielder at cover on this occasion though
back of a length, on middle, and pulled in front of square. Chase for the fielder in the deep as Kohli moves on to 98
length ball, on middle, and tapped off his pads to the gap near square leg
back of a length, slower ball on middle. Shoveled to mid-off from the back foot

And that's the answer to life, universe and everything else! ODI century number 42 for Kohli Full, on middle, and driven to long on. Kohli takes his helmet off, points at the name at the back of his jersey and soaks in the applause
back of a length, on off, and tapped off the back foot to the bowler
full, just outside off, but angling in. Iyer stays on the back foot, and guides it to third man
length ball outside off again. Chopped to third man once again for a single
nearly a yorker, on off, and he shovels a shot right into his boot. Ball ricochets away as the batsmen pinch the single
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Waits for the ball to get to him, before cutting square to point
tries to chop this length-ball down to third man, but too fine. Stopped by the keeper
muscled over mid-off! Not the most attractive shot, but still enough power. Full outside off, and played over the infield
full, just outside off, and he hammers a drive down to long on. Team 200
back of a length, on leg, and he swivels to pull. Manages to clear short fine leg for two more. Hundred partnership too
yorker, on off, but dug away to short cover. A bit of away swing on this occasion
played to the leg side, and they manage to pinch a single
full, on leg, and flicked to short fine leg. Oshane dives to his left to slow the ball's pace down, and then recovers to stop the four
full, just outside off, and guided to third man. Iyer's third ODI fifty in 6 innings
length ball, angling in, and he tries to whip it square. Hits him near the groin instead
length ball, on middle, and he backs away to make room. Looks to play it over the infield, but doesn't have the pace for it
flicked past short fine leg! Full, angling into his pads, and played very fine on this occasion
ramped but there's protection at third man. Another short ball from the bowler
length ball, on middle, and tapped to point for a single
wild heave, but no connection. Length ball outside off, and he tries to smack it over midwicket. Misses completely
good use of the wrists! Length ball, angling into his pads, and he flicks it past the keeper's left for four. Using the bowler's pace
just over midwicket! Flicks this full delivery over Carlos Brathwaite at midwicket, and the ball has enough legs to deep deep square leg too
Hope misses a catch! Genuine edge from Kohli, but just wide of the diving Hope. Back of a length, outside off, and he tried to punch it square... instead the ball found his outside edge. Streaky runs
length ball, on off, and defended off the back foot to the bowler
full, on off, and driven straight past the bowler's left to long off

it's a skyer and Roach makes no mistake at long off. The fielder went deep just before this delivery. Slower ball, not full enough, and Kohli tries to muscle it leg-side. Top-edges it and Roach got under the ball quite early. A tired shot, but Kohli walks back to a big round of applause
length ball outside off, and angling in. Mistimes a leg-side clip to square leg
slower ball, length ball outside off. Jadhav sticks his bat out trying to guide it fine, but can't make the connection
fullish, just outside off, and he bottom-hands a drive to long on for a single
back of a length, rising delivery, but Jadhav muscles a pull past Roston Chase at deep square leg for four. Ball drops just inside the rope
full, on middle, and tapped to the off side for a quick single
Full, just outside off, and driven to cover
slower ball, back of a length, and flicked to square leg for one
full, just outside off, and driven to wide long off for a single
length ball, just outside off, and tapped to cover
full, just outside off, and he rolls his wrists over the ball. Guided to square leg
full, outside off, and he leans forward for a square drive. Protection in the deep though
length ball, outside off, and he runs this down fine to short third man
nearly a yorker, on off, and clipped to deep square leg for a single
waist-high full toss, and punched to wide long on
back of a length, outside off, and whizzing past the batsman's helmet. Did well to sway out of the delivery's line
back of a length, outside off, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
full, on off, and flicked to deep midwicket for a single
tees off! Full, fast and hammered over long on! Holds the pose too as the ball hits the second-tier's pillar
back of a length, outside off, and the attempted pull is under-edged onto his body
back of a length, outside off, and uppishly punched to long on. Team 250
full and wide outside off, and Iyer walks towards the delivery to play the square cut. Misses
full just outside off, and he tries to play the cut shot once more. Misses again

leg stump gone! Full, on middle, and Iyer had walked across the stumps - exposing two wickets. Can't connect with the flick either, and his stumps are rattled. A solid innings comes to an end, a strong case for Iyer to continue being India's No. 4
length ball, on leg stump, and Jadeja defends off the back foot
full on off, and Jadeja comes down the wicket to try and extract some extra pace. Cut square to deep point
full, on off, and he mistimes a drive to long on
slower ball, length on leg stump, and pulled past the square-leg umpire for four
full, just outside off, and the attempted late cut finds short third man. They manage to pinch a single nonetheless though
full toss on leg stump, and he flicks to short fine leg. Slight hesitation between the batsmen for a run, but they eventually decide to take it anyway
wedged away to cover, and they run across for a single, but the throw is on top of the stumps at the bowler's end. Cottrell is quick to dislodge the bails, and Jadhav is out by a fair distance
back of a length, outside off, and through to the keeper
slower ball, full just outside off, and fended with soft hands
length ball, outside off, and angling away. He muscles a cut to point for a single
back of a length, outside off, and tapped to point for a single
full, on middle, and he goes for a wild slog. Inside-edged to fine leg for a single
back of a length, outside off, but he comes down the ground to lift it over deep point. Sliced, and taken in the deep
full, on off, and he slogs cross-batted past the fielder at deep midwicket! Bludgeoned
slower ball, outside off, and he tries to play a late cut. Mistimed to point
length ball, wide outside off. The extra pace makes the ball beat the bat. Through to Hope
full, just outside off, and he tries to muscle this over the bowler. Toe-ends the shot back to Cottrell
full just outside off, and drilled to wide long off. Just a single
slower ball, but a well-placed yorker just outside off. Batsman fails to make the connection
back of a length, outside off, and he misses the attempted pull. But the umpire gives it a wide anyway, so Shami can have another shot next ball
full, on middle, and tapped to the off side for a quick single
slower ball, overpitched just outside off, and driven to wide long off. Another double for India
slower ball, short too, and Shami can't connect with the swipe. They discuss whether there was an edge from the batsman, but choose to not review eventually
length ball, outside off, tries to cut, but can't connect
full and wide outside off. Jadeja looks to tee off, but lets it go after seeing how wide it was
full toss, on off, and flicked in front of square on the leg side. Protection there, so two more for Jadeja
shoveled to cow corner. They could've taken one, but Jadeja refuses the single
full, outside off, and aims for cow corner. Toe-ends it to point instead
back of a length, on off, and pulled to deep midwicket. Throw not good enough to Shami comes back for the second. India make 279 for 7
short of a length and pushed across off stump, squared up a touch as he stabs away from the body to get it down to third man
short of a length just outside off, pushes way from the body, into the off side
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
length outside off, punched to cover off the back foot
nicely played, won't beat mid-off though. Length and just outside off, punched on the rise
length ball slanted across off stump, hangs the bat inside the line and allows it to pass
length and in at leg stump, nudged to midwicket from the crease
short of a length and angled down leg side, can't get bat on that
beaten. Half-hearted. Short and wide and he wants to cut. Checks himself, but too late
short of a length wide outside off, left alone
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
that pings off nicely. Length and in at off stump. He's locked on the front foot a bit but brings the bat down with an open face and squeezes it past point
length on off, another sweet sounding punch on the front foot. Straight to mid-off
short ball, angled away from the corridor. Anxious prod at it, beaten
length on middle stump, dropped into the midwicket region to steal a single
caressed over the long leg boundary! Lewis has timed his last three shots to perfection. This one the easiest shot of them all. Short on leg stump, he swivels and pulls sweetly
sublime punch. Short of a length just outside off, he finds extra cover
short of a length, cutting away outside off. Left alone
length ball with some shape away outside off, left alone
length on off stump, brings the bat down at an angle, thick inside edge out to fine leg
short outside off, left alone
length and in at off stump, pushed down the pitch off the front foot
short of a length outside off, sliced to backward point
length and in at off stump, defended to point
short of a length, cramping him at off stump, pushed to point
length at middle stump, looks to punch straight, gets it off the inside half
length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
bad bounce for Pant diving to his right and this sneaks past him. Slower ball at  a length down leg side
short of a length wide outside off, left alone
short of a length, climbing steeply in the corridor. Left alone
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
slower ball at a length in the corridor, defended into the off side
shot! Nicely on top of this. Shami slams this short and just outside off. Lewis gets on his back toes, front leg in the air, and cuts to beat third man to his left
crunch. Some delicious sounds coming from Lewis' bat. Short of a length outside off and he finds point with the punch
length just outside off, punched to cover off the back foot
length outside off, left alone
beaten. Short and wide, looks to carve it through point, beaten by bounce
length on middle stump, defended to mid-on off the back foot
bat-pad into the covers. That's full and shaping away from off stump. A lazy bat swing down at it
short of a length and shaping away wide outside off, left alone
length on middle stump, pushed to mid-on on the rise

flies through vacant second slip! Oh that's unfortunate. Short of a length, curving away, jumping up as he defends at it. Thick edge. There was first slip all this time, and he may have had a half-chance
length and swung away outside off, left alone
beaten. Khaleel getting it to swing. 139kph, length and swung away. Looks to slash through cover
length on leg stump, nudged to short fine's left
length on off stump, pushed to cover point off the front foot
length at off stump, punched to mid-off
length at off stump, cramped on the punch. Hurriedly tapped towards mid-off
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
swipes it past short fine. Short and into the pads and he gets enough of the inside edge to beat that fielder with a pull
short of a length outside off, chopped down to third man and Gayle is now West Indies' top-scorer in ODIs
length and in the corridor, left alone
thick inside edge to mid-on's left. Length outside off, looks to drive, through it early
short of a length, wide outside off. Left alone
slaughtered. Short of a length just outside off, frees his arms and brings the axe down on this. Blazes between backward point and cover
length and just outside off, punched firmly on the up to extra cover
whack! Oh those wrists. Full and wide outside off, hardly a stride but a full swing of the bat and an open face to get this past backward point
oh gorgeous again, but there's a fielder in the deep to stop this drive. Full and wide, and a nice flow through the line again

Gayle has reviewed an lbw decision. That was full and on middle stump. Sounded like an inside edge, but Gayle took some time to think about it, so that's out of the question I suppose. He's struck right in front of middle...is it pitching in line? Just. The decision will stand. And the review is gone. As is Gayle. Bhuvneshwar strikes. India wanted Shami to bowl this over, but he'd been off the field for a bit and wasn't back in time to come straight on. Inadvertently, it has worked. Full ball pitching on leg, skidding on and rapping him. He was just hanging the bat out without a stride
Jadeja doesn't pick up the ball and Lewis survives a potential run-out call. This length ball was steered to point's left and he couldn't get a clean pick up with Lewis quite some way out
length on middle stump, punched to midwicket
short of a length just outside off. Looks to slap it through the covers. Inside edge into the leg side
length and across off stump. Steered to third man with the angle
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
yorker just outside off, jammed into the turf
short of a length offcutter at leg stump, dabbed into the square leg region
full on off stump, leans in, flicks to midwicket
short of a length and turning in at middle, punched back to the bowler
length on middle stump, gets down on this late and gets it to midwicket's right off the inside half
length and just outside off, punched to long-off off the back foot
full outside off, leans in and flicks to long-on
full outside off, blocked on the front foot
full and just outside off, driven on the front foot to mid-off

chops it on! Short of a length and rising up and away from the corridor. Looks to punch it through cover and the closed face has resulted in an inside edge. We saw the Indian batsmen struggling to hit through the line earlier. That's because the ball has been gripping all day. And it does so again, he's through the shot too early and is not in particularly good shape for the punch by the end og it all
length ball down leg side, can't connect on the flick
length on leg stump, flicked to mid-on's left on the front foot
sliced out to deep square. Short ball at the chest, can't connect sweetly on the pull

big appeal for catch behind. Only from Pant. But Kohli is convinced. He takes the review as the covers come on. Length ball outside off, looks to drive on the up, away from the body. That straightened. There's nothing on it. It will remain not out. India lose the review.
full, on leg stump, and going further down. Wide called
full, just outside off, and firmly fended off the front foot
full, on leg, and swept behind square. Nobody there, and that's four for Lewis
full, on middle, and turning away. Defends off the back foot, but the ball takes the outside edge to short third man
length ball, just outside off, and skidding through. Punched to cover, where Kohli misfields
length ball, slower through the air. Pitches outside off, and turns away - cut to point
full outside off, and driven with the turn to deep cover
full outside off, and cut with the turn to Khaleel at point
length ball, on off and angling in. Tries to pull, but mistimes to midwicket
length ball, outside off, and cut square to Jadeja at backward point. May have hurt his fingers there, but has a smile on his face. He's torn his T-shirt!
back of a length, outside off, and he drags a pull to deep midwicket. Just a single

back of a length on middle, angling in, and he swivels to pull behind square. Couple of bounces and that's four, but Lewis is struggling. He's either got a hamstring problem or a cramp. Think it's the former. We'll keep you updated. Hobbling, but not giving up
length ball, just outside off, and he punches straight to mid-on
back of a length, outside off, and he flays a cut. Finds point though
full, on leg, and he tries to sweep, but the ball goes down the leg side
full outside off, and driven away from his body to Bhuvi at wide long off
full, just outside off, and he smacks a drive to deep cover
length ball, outside off, and he makes room before cutting behind square. Just a single though
full, on middle, and he sweeps fine. Misfield from Shami at short fine leg, but he recovers well to stop the boundary
extra flight, wide outside off, and hammered through extra cover! Kohli did well to not get his fingers to that. Creamed
full, outside off, and driven to wide long off
Shami around the wicket appeals for an lbw, but not given. Full, on middle, and angling in. That's what probably saves Hetmyer since the ball was angling down leg. Ball was high too
length, wide enough for Hetmyer to flay a cut past Jadeja at point. Third man has no chance

back of a length, outside off, and he pulls in front of square. Drops just short of Khaleel at mid-on, who parries the ball further away. Recovers well to stop the four, but Kohli gives Khaleel some angry eyes
length ball, on off, and angling into off stump. Fended
flicked fine! Full, angling down leg, and that goes past the keeper. Leg-byes signalled though
length ball, outside off, and cut in front of square. Mistimed to cover
tossed up, ends up as a low full toss. Driven to deep extra cover
length, on off, and turning away. Makes room and cuts to the deep
fuller, quicker outside off stump. Tries to drive, but it goes to short third man
full, on off, and fended with soft hands
full, on off, and driven with the bat's open face to extra cover. They walk across for one

sliced and Kohli - his RCB captain - calls for the catch. Taken at short cover. This was a half-tracker on middle, and Hetmyer tried to pull this over cow corner, but the ball went the other direction. A disappointed Hetty walks back in super-slow-mo
full, on off, and punched to long on
full outside off, and he reaches forward to drive. Finds deep extra cover, Dhawan
full, wide-ish outside off, and crunched to deep extra cover. Struck so hard that they can only take a single
full, on off, and angling into middle. Tries to defend towards cover, but the ball takes an inside-edgeto the leg side
length, wide outside off, and cut square
full, wide and he chops a cut to deep point. Dhawan's wayward throw is stopped by short third-man
flighted, ends up as a low full toss on leg stump. Driven to long on
full, on middle, and driven to cover
full, outside off, and driven with the turn to cover. Kohli has to drive to intercept the ball
full, outside off, and turning away. Lewis offers no shot
full, just outside off. Tapped with the bat's open face to point
full outside off, and wild turn away from Lewis. He tries to drive, but completely done in by the extra spin
full outside off, and he tries to flay a cut. Under-edged into the deck, and hits Pant on his helmet! Thank God for the grille
full, just outside off, and driven to cover
overpitched, on off, and he smacks a drive through the covers! Pierces the gap between two fielders. Team hundred too
slower from Jadhav, wide outside off, and he tries to muscle a drive over cover. Slices it instead, and the ball falls just short of Kuldeep at short third man
faster one, flatter, on off stump. Defended off the back foot
full, on off, and guided with the bat's open face to point. They jog across for one
full outside off, and he tries to drive. Takes the inside edge instead, and nearly clips leg stump
flighted full on off, and he drills a drive to long off for a single
length ball outside off, and turning away. He cuts, in front of square, but there's protection in the deep
full outside off, and driven with the bat's open face to extra cover
flighted, ends up as a full toss. Tries to muscle this straight, but inside-edges the shot onto his pads. Ball rolls away towards the non-striker
full, outside off, but he prepares to sweep early. Slighted top-edged, but over the fielder at square leg. Kuldeep can't finish the over well
length ball, outside off, and he makes room to cut. Mistimed to point
that's through Pant's legs! Overpitched outside off, and Pant tried to close his knees to stop the ball, but he's a second too late
length ball, wide outside off, and he plays a late cut. Guided to short third man, and that's his first half-century v India!
full, outside off, and cut late. Finds the gap between short third man and backward point, and that's four more for WI
slower through the air. Full, outside off, and he's through the cut too early. Smart take by Pant
full outside off, and slapped to deep extra cover. Keeps strike
nearly into the cark park! Full toss, juicy on off stump, and that's been clobbered over cow corner. What connection
length ball outside off, and turning further away. Mistimes a cut to deep extra cover
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point
length ball, outside off, and punched to extra cover for a single
overpitched outside off, and straight into Pant's gloves
length ball, wide outside off, and turning further away. Cuts to deep point once again
full, on off, and defended gently to the leg side
length ball, on middle. Makes room to punch, but stopped at cover
full and fast, on off stump. He's hurried into a back-foot punch to the bowler
slower through the air. Length ball outside off, and cut square
full, on off, and driven to long off for a jogging single

huge appeal for caught behind but not given, and India don't have a review either. This was full and fast outside off, and Lewis tried to cut, but the ball went into the keeper's gloves. Was it out? Only the replays can tell
length ball outside off. Turning away, and cut to the man in the deep
full, on off, and he skips down the wicket to meet the ball. Placed well near deep extra cover, but the ball slows down as it gets to the rope
paddle swept to deep backward square! Full, on middle, and he was in position early. Exquisite shot
flighted, on off, and he tries to drive through the covers. Toe-ends the shot onto his toes instead
full, on middle, and carefully fended off the front foot. Ball flies off the outside edge to short third man
length ball, outside off, and he flays a cut to deep point
fuller but way too outside off for the umpire's liking
better, in the blockhole, pushed back towards the bowler
brilliant placement, length ball outside off and punched off the back foot through extra cover
fuller outside off and drilled towards extra cover, Kohli gets his right hand to it to slow it down
length ball, outside off, and punched to long off
length ball, on middle, and pulled straight to long on
length ball outside off, and punched to cover. No chance of a run
length ball outside off, and turning away. Cut off the back foot to the deep

one-handed catch! And Kohli asks *someone* to shut up by putting his finger to his lips. Just not sure who... This was a short and wide ball, that was turning further away, and Lewis toe-ended a cut. Kohli timed his jump to perfection by sticking his right hand over his head. Big, big wicket
full, on off stump. Driven to Shami at point, and off the mark
full, wide outside off, and driven with the turn to extra cover
full, on leg stump, and clipped to deep backward square leg for a single
overpitched, just outside off. Wedges the shot to short third man
length ball, outside off, and cut square
length ball, just outside off, and tapped with soft hands to cover
full, on middle, and turning into his pads. Tapped towards the non-striker
length ball, just outside off. Defended to point for a quick single
full outside off, and driven to deep extra cover for a single
full, on leg stump. Whipped to the leg side, but intercepted by short midwicket
full, outside off, and turning in. Driven well to wide long off, but the ball is slowed down since Jadeja - at cover - got a hand to it
length ball, outside off, and cut square to the fielder riding the extra-cover boundary
full, on leg stump. Drilled to wide long on for one
beats him! Flighted, full outside off, and turning away. Tries to drive but the ball goes under his bat
faster one, length ball outside off, and he crunches a cut to the deep
full, on middle, and driven to long off. Kuldeep bowls out - he will be the only India bowler today to deliver 10 overs
length at middle, driven to long-on
short of a length at off, punched into the covers
short outside off, cut to point
length on off, driven to sweeper cover
top edge as he looks for the reverse sweep outside off. Harmlessly plonks in front of point
short of a length and ripping in at the stumps. Hurriedly nudged to point
short and wide outside off, chopped with the angle to sweeper's left
length outside off, stabs away from the body, beaten
full outside off, drills it on the front foot. Off the low end of the bat. Extra cover dives to his left and parries it towards mid-off
short of a length at leg stump, looks to flick and cops it on the thigh guard
beaten. Short of a length in the corridor. Looks for the pull and goes through it too quickly
oh there he goes, flying. Jadeja at point, grabbing this back foot punch to his left. He knows it's good. Big smile
length and just outside off, defended towards point off the back foot
dropped! Shami has completely missed that in his follow through. Length ball on off stump, looks to drive, is through it early. Shami blindsided, gets it on the bicep

overthrows. Short of a length on off, pulled straight to midwicket where Iyer picks cleanly on the bounce and chucks it at the non-striker's end. Pooran was in. Kohli, at extra cover, watches the ball fly away and asks Iyer why he bothered to throw. Irony? Poor decision, nonetheless.
short and very wide outside off, left alone
length on middle stump, drilled on the rise to long-on
length on off stump, tapped into the covers

through short fine! Hand on face for the Indian captain. Poor ball to start with - short and into the hips. Pooran turns it with the angle. It dips on Bhuvneshwar and he's late to get down on this and get his body behind it. Drops in front of him and skids past
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length on off stump, defended into the off side
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
beaten. Short and rising in the corridor. Opens up and has a heave at this. Can't connect
full toss on off stump, driven to mid-off
full on middle stump, hard hands on the attempted drive. Thick inside edge to deep square
short of a length just outside off, punched to sweeper cover on the rise

taken at midwicket! Oh he was looking scratchy the last 20 minutes. Bhuvneshwar comes back and gets him. That might be a shorter knuckle ball. Middle stump line. Jumps into the leg side and looks for the pull. Slices it up and Kohli is there
short outside off, looks to cut off the front foot, it whizzes past the bat
length outside off, sliced on the up to point

plucks that out of the air, horizontal to his left! Wow! Bhuvneshwar Kumar! Flipped the game in five minutes. Length ball at off and middle. He wants to turn this into the leg side, but it sticks in the pitch. And it floats back off the shoulder of his bat. It's very far to the bowler's left, but he's managed to steady himself and go full stretch, one-handed. And he's held on. Back up quickly with a sheepish grin. Superb.
short of a length outside off, chopped firmly but straight to Jadeja at point
length and in at middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
length at off stump, tapped on the rise, back to the bowler
length, in at middle stump. Punched to midwicket off the back foot
length on off stump, hurriedly defended on the front foot

taken at short third. Self-destruct, activate. India have found 10 minutes resembling an opening, and they've used it to get all over West Indies. Length at off stump, Brathwaite with a frenzied swing across the line, without getting to the pitch. That's Jadeja's angle making him go leg side. But Jadeja has also got this to grip and spin away. Leading edge is held with no fuss
length on middle stump, blocked on the front foot. Overstepped. Free hit coming up
beaten. 102kph, round-arm and in the corridor at a length. Like Brathwaite, Roach goes with the angle. But this straightens past the off stump
oh lovely drive. Only one. Length outside off and he uses his reach to drive through the line to sweeper's right
chopped on. Length ball just outside off. Roach shuffles across and looks to poke into the off side. Inside edge onto the stumps. Wasn't behind the line. That doesn't help
bouncer at an off stump line, ducks under it
past the bat. Pant is screeching behind the stumps for catch behind. Short ball jumps up in the corridor, and there's a sound as it goes past. Glove? Possibly. No review left
length and in at middle stump, poked to midwicket from deep in the crease
length in the corridor, defended into the off side
length on middle stump, tapped to long-on
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length at off, steps out and spanks on the rise to long-off
sweeeeet sloggin'. The Association of Number Tens will be proud of that. Length and in at middle stump, and no pretence from Cottrell. Ugly heave across the line to beat long-on to his right
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, looks to drive, thick inside edge to short fine's left
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
full and just outside off, nicely driven along the floor to long-off
beaten. Bouncer outside off, gets inside the line and tries to hook
short and outside off. Stabbed to point's right
full on off stump, full face offered as he taps this back
yorker length at leg stump, jammed into the leg side
full toss outside off, driven to sweeper cover
full outside off, clears the front leg, drives to long-off
bouncer at leg stump, left alone

clears the boundary! Cottell's had enough ducking the short ones! This is up at his chest, he gets his weight onto his back leg, is almost ducking under it, but then gives it a clean swing to get it well to deep square's left
short and wide. Looks to cut, beaten
lovely slower ball. Floats up and dips under the bat as it curves away from off stump. Holder's eyes had lit up as he swung at this
and again. Looks a length ball there for a smiting, but it just doesn't get up off the pitch. Skids through
length outside off, inside edge onto pad as he looks to slog this
short of deep midwicket. Another slower ball. Length outside off, swings for it. Gets bat this time, but no control. It's off the toe-end
full toss outside off, driven to long-off
another slower ball. Short of a length. Outside off. Looks to slog, through it early
oooh curving yorker. Comes rapidly in from off stump and Holder just manages to jam it to extra cover's right
clears mid-off. Slower ball at a length outside off, backs away and carves it over the fielder

holds on! Jadeja running backwards from backward point, towards third man, who is also sprinting in. Short ball in the corridor, looks to pull and slices it. Jadeja keeps his eyes on it looking over his shoulder. Fumbles after getting his hands on it, but holds on
full toss on leg stump, flicked to deep square
low full toss, dipping in at off stump. Driven to long-off
given! Shami goes around the wicket, fires it in at middle stump. Oshane looks to block and is trapped right in front of the stumps. Was there bat on it? Hard to tell. No review though. That is that
